title: Trump handed dual court defeats amid ongoing legal woes
description: The former US president is facing two criminal proceedings, as well as a civil case brought by writer E Jean Carroll.

title: Honduras to build island colony to imprison gang members
description: Officials hope the isolated facility will cut gang members off from criminal networks on the mainland.

title: Protests in Thailand as rivals derail Pita’s PM bid
description: Thai parliament blocks Move Forward Party's progressive leader from renomination for prime minister, prompting protests.

title: Australia vs Ireland: Women’s World Cup preview
description: Sam Kerr's Australia will hope to make the most of their recent form and home advantage in their opener against Ireland.

title: As Cuba’s private sector roars back, choices and inequality rise
description: Even as more small businesses have popped up across the island, some simply can't afford what's on sale.

title: US athletes allege hazing abuse at Northwestern University
description: Student-athletes say hazing at the prominent Illinois university included 'physical, sexual and emotional abuse'.

title: El-Sisi pardons Egyptian researcher Patrick Zaki and lawyer

title: Germany debates siestas as Europe grapples with soaring heat

title: Are we heading towards a far-right European Union?
description: We always assumed European unity would imply greater cosmopolitanism and multiculturalism, but that may not be the case.
